short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Reddit promoted posts and advertisements in the feed and sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension leverages the class-name properties of promoted posts and advertisements on Reddit. By inserting CSS into the DOM, it is the =n able to hide these posts and advertisements from view.

The screenshot doesn't really do it justice. Please install and see for yourself!

The extension options allow you to enable/disable console logging for those that are interested.
